content: this pattern got its name from the rock cap moss this hat can be made with worsted yarn just cast on 88 rather than 80 stitches and subtract 1 from the length this hat is adult size medium width can be adjusted by adding or subtracting stitches in multiples of 8 k1p1 ribbing is 5 to be folded for a non-folded brim k1p1 for 2 5 for a more fitted beanie begin crown decreases at 8 5 from co edge this is my first hat design and i m very happy with the result i hope you enjoy knitting this pattern i m making it free because i have enjoyed many free patterns from my fellow ravelrers so thank you special thanks to melisa and hannah for their input in creating this pattern
